trans-unit.resname: O90P·1 | Chaos Orb | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: If CARDNAME is on the battlefield, flip CARDNAME onto the battlefield from a height of at least one foot. If CARDNAME turns over completely at least once during the flip, destroy all nontoken permanents it touches. Then destroy CARDNAME.
